Class MovementLogic

java.lang.Object
  MovementLogic

public class MovementLogic
extends java.lang.Object

MovementLogic.java This file keeps track of all movement and geographical information that the robot is involved in. It takes most of the logic that was originally in BotPanel and moves it from the server to the robot, as is part of the project requirements for the robot.

Revision History:

  • March 27, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Created file.

TURN_UNIT

public static final double TURN_UNIT

Constant Field Values

speed

protected static int speed
The robot's current moving speed. Hopefully in some intelligent unit one day. This is the speed that the motors think in, not the speed that the GUI uses. The GUI uses speed/BotPanel.SPEED_DIVISOR.

protected static int turnDirection
The direction the robot is turning.

initialize

public static void initialize(java.lang.String mapFile)
Initializes things for movement logic. Ostensibly, it can be longer, but for now it only sets the map file.

Parameters:
mapFile - The filename where the map is stored.

Parameters:
direction - The direction that the robot is moving in

Straight

public static void Straight(int inches)
Tells the robot to go straight however many inches are passed into the method. A negative number will move the robot in reverse.

Parameters:
inches - inches to move.

edgeDetect

public static void edgeDetect()
Checks if there has been a collision with a wall, and reverses robot movement.

                             double angleR,
                             java.awt.Color color)
Plots a point

Parameters:
xR - X coordinate of the robot
yR - Y coordinate of the robot
distanceP - Distance to the plot point.
angleR - Distance to the plot point.
color - The color to plot the point in.
